name: Espionage - Send Spies on Conquest Missions! Build a Global Intelligence Organization in a Game of World Domination
name_original: Espionage - Send Spies on Conquest Missions! Build a Global Intelligence Organization in a Game of World Domination
description:
Espionage puts you in command of a global intelligence and spy organization vying for world domination!

Lead your choice of factions from the righteous Vanguard to the villainous Cadmus, each with their own talents and weaknesses. Beginning from a single safehouse, recruit agents, train them, and send them on missions to expand your global influence. Conquer cities around the world and transform your small operation into a global powerhouse. Then, when the time is right, begin your bid for power and try to take over the world!

Featuring five different agent types, eleven cities with unique languages and agents to recruit, and over 300 possible endgame storylines, Espionage is sure to appeal to any fan of James Bond, Mission: Impossible, or Marvel’s Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. who found themselves thinking, “I can do that!”

Espionage Features:

- Choose your faction, each with unique strengths and weaknesses, and start your quest for world domination
- Choose a starting city and build a base of operations
- Earn money and expand your operation into new cities
- Spread your network of spies across the world in a tactical game of conquest
- Use your agents’ charm, stealth and combat prowess to conquer unique challenges
- Hire and disavow agents, but watch out for traitors in your midst
- Train your agents in the art of spy work: speech, vehicles, thievery and more
- Over 300 possible endings
- Compare your score with friends and players worldwide to see who is the ultimate spy

Your mission, should you choose to accept it: Download Espionage and build a global network of spies unlike any the world has seen. Start today, and take power your way!
